name: Reconnaître - Open Recognition Alliance
goal: The mission of Reconnaître — Open Recognition Alliance (Reconnaître) is to build an open and learning society based on the recognition of the talents, skills and aspirations of individuals, communities and territories; encourage, promote, support and federate open initiatives and innovations that contribute to it.
interests: Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Our main policy targets are:

Education, training and youth: the Bologna Process, the Copenhagen Process, the strategic framework for European cooperation in education and training (ET 2020), the European Agenda for adult learning, the European Education Area, Upskilling Pathways , the promotion of European values.

Employment and social affairs: equal opportunities, social inclusion, European Pillar of Social Rights, Europe in a changing world - Inclusive, innovative and reflective societies .

Digital economy & society: the digital agenda for Europe, privacy, personal data protection, trust infrastructures.

EU 2020
